title: Paul Desmond - Feeling Blue (1996)  [Jazz][mp3 320][h33t][schon5
description:
Paul Desmond - Feeling Blue (1996)
Year: 1996 
Genre: Jazz / cool 
Label: Camden 
Size: 190mb
Bitrate: 320 kbps

Here in this one album you can listen to the musical development of a sax player extraordinaire: the silky, seductive sounds of a genius.  From every track on this compilation CD comes the gentleness, warmth and musicianship of a human who considered himself the world's slowest sax player.  None of the raucous intensity of screaming horns here - instead savour the purity of sax, guitar and rhythm section and marvel at the depths of feeling that Paul Desmond expressed with such seeming ease.  His untimely death in 1977 left an enormous hole in jazz music.  Listening to this album makes us realise why it is that the hole has been impossible to fill. - Amazon reviewer

Cuts # 1, 3, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12 are from Paul Desmond's Easy Living - 6/63, 7/64, 9/64, 6/65: 
Personnel: 
Paul Desmond/Alto Sax 
Jim Hall/Guitar 
Eugene Wright/Bass (1, 8, 12) 
Eugene Cherico/Bass (6) 
Percy Heath/Bass (3, 7, 10) 
Connie Kay/Drums 

Cuts # 2, 5, 11, 13 are from Paul Desmond's Take Ten - 6/63 
Personnel: 
Paul Desmond/Alto Sax 
Jim Hall/Guitar 
Gene Cherico/Bass (2, 5, 11) 
Gene Wright/Bass (13) 
Connie Kay/Drums 

Cuts # 4 & 9 are from Paul Desmond's Desmond Blue - 10/61 
Personnel: 
Paul Desmond/Alto Sax 
Milt Hinton/Bass 
Robert Thomas/Drums/Percussion/Strings 
Albert Richman/French Horn 
Romeo Penque/Woodwinds 
Stan Webb/Woodwinds 
Gloria Agostini/Harp 

Cut # 14 is from Desmond/Mulligan's Two of a Mind - 9/62 
Personnel: 
Paul Desmond/alto sax 
Gerry Mulligan/baritone Sax 
Wendell Marshall/bass 
Connie Kay/drums
